text: NYC Ghosts & Flowers is the 11th album by Sonic Youth. It received highly polarizing reviews from critics. == Track listing == # "Free City Rhymes" 7:31 # "Renegade Princess" 5:50 # "Nevermind (What Was It Anyway) 5:35 # "Small Flowers Crack Concrete" 5:12 # "Side2Side" 3:34 # "StreamXSonikSubway" 2:51 # "NYC Ghosts & Flowers" 7:52 # "Lightnin'" 3:52 Category:Sonic Youth albums Category:2000 albums
title: NYC Ghosts & Flowers
